member.name: M:Neo.Extensions.BigIntegerExtensions.GetLowestSetBit(System.Numerics.BigInteger)
member.summary: Finds the lowest set bit in the specified value. If value is zero, returns -1.
member.param: The value to find the lowest set bit in. The value.GetBitLength cannot greater than 2Gib.
member.returns: The lowest set bit in the specified value.

member.name: M:Neo.Extensions.BigIntegerExtensions.Mod(System.Numerics.BigInteger,System.Numerics.BigInteger)
member.summary: Computes the remainder of the division of the specified value by the modulus. It's different from the `%` operator(see `BigInteger.Remainder`) if the dividend is negative. It always returns a non-negative value even if the dividend is negative.
member.param: The value to compute the remainder of(i.e. dividend).
member.returns: The remainder of the division of the specified value by the modulus.
member.exception: Thrown when the divisor is zero.

member.name: M:Neo.Extensions.BigIntegerExtensions.ModInverse(System.Numerics.BigInteger,System.Numerics.BigInteger)
member.summary: Computes the modular inverse of the specified value.
member.param: The value to find the modular inverse of.
member.returns: The modular inverse of the specified value.
member.exception: Thrown when the value or modulus is out of range.
Thrown when no modular inverse exists for the given inputs. i.e. when the value and modulus are not coprime.

member.name: M:Neo.Extensions.BigIntegerExtensions.TestBit(System.Numerics.BigInteger,System.Int32)
member.summary: Tests whether the specified bit is set in the specified value. If the value is negative and index exceeds the bit length, it returns true. If the value is positive and index exceeds the bit length, it returns false. If index is negative, it returns false always. NOTE: the `value` is represented in sign-magnitude format, so it's different from the bit value in two's complement format(int, long).
member.param: The index of the bit to test.
member.returns: True if the specified bit is set in the specified value, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Neo.Extensions.BigIntegerExtensions.Sum(System.Collections.Generic.IEnumerable{System.Numerics.BigInteger})
member.summary: Finds the sum of the specified integers.

member.name: M:Neo.Extensions.BigIntegerExtensions.ToByteArrayStandard(System.Numerics.BigInteger)
member.summary: Converts a to byte array in little-endian and eliminates all the leading zeros. If the value is zero, it returns an empty byte array.

member.name: M:Neo.Extensions.BigIntegerExtensions.Sqrt(System.Numerics.BigInteger)
member.summary: Computes the square root of the specified value.
member.param: The value to compute the square root of.
member.returns: The square root of the specified value.
member.exception: Thrown when the value is negative.

member.name: M:Neo.Extensions.BigIntegerExtensions.GetBitLength(System.Numerics.BigInteger)
member.summary: Gets the number of bits required for shortest two's complement representation of the current instance without the sign bit. Note: This method is imprecise and might not work as expected with integers larger than 256 bits if less than .NET5.
member.returns: The minimum non-negative number of bits in two's complement notation without the sign bit.
member.remarks: This method returns 0 if the value of current object is equal to or . For positive integers the return value is equal to the ordinary binary representation string length.

member.name: M:Neo.Extensions.BigIntegerExtensions.BitLength(System.Numerics.BigInteger)
member.summary: GetBitLength for earlier than .NET5.0

member.summary: Defines methods to support the comparison of two [].

member.summary: Computes the 32-bit hash value for the specified byte array using the xxhash3 algorithm.

The seed used by the xxhash3 algorithm.

member.summary: Removes the key-value pairs from the dictionary that match the specified predicate.
member.typeparam: The type of the keys in the dictionary.
The type of the values in the dictionary.

member.name: M:Neo.Extensions.CollectionExtensions.Chunk``1(System.Collections.Generic.IReadOnlyCollection{``0},System.Int32)
member.summary: Chunks the source collection into chunks of the specified size. For example, if the source collection is [1, 2, 3, 4, 5] and the chunk size is 3, the result will be [[1, 2, 3], [4, 5]].
member.typeparam: The type of the elements in the collection.
member.returns: An enumerable of arrays, each containing a chunk of the source collection.
member.exception: Thrown when the source collection is null.
Thrown when the chunk size is less than or equal to 0.
